org.fxmisc.richtext.util.skin

Interface Visual

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SimpleVisual
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComplexVisualBase, StyledTextAreaVisual

    public interface Visual
    Represents the view aspect of a JavaFX control. It defines how the control is rendered visually on the screen. The implementations should either implement SimpleVisual, or extend from ComplexVisualBase.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Called to release resources associated with this Visual when it is no longer being used, in particular to stop observing the control, i.e.
      default java.util.List<javafx.css.CssMetaData<? extends javafx.css.Styleable,?>> getCssMetaData()
      Returns information about the extra styleable properties availabe on the skin in addition to those available on the control itself.

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Called to release resources associated with this Visual when it is no longer being used, in particular to stop observing the control, i.e. remove any listeners, etc.

      • getCssMetaData

        default java.util.List<javafx.css.CssMetaData<? extends javafx.css.Styleable,?>> getCssMetaData()
        Returns information about the extra styleable properties availabe on the skin in addition to those available on the control itself. The default implementation returns an empty list.
